home.title: Frontend React Developer
home.description: Hi, I'm Dmitriy Babiy. A passionate Front-end React Developer based in Krasnoyarsk, Russia. üìç

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.subtitle: A dedicated Front-end Developer based in Krasnoyarsk, Russia üìç
about.description: As a Junior Front-End Developer, I possess an impressive arsenal of skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Tailwind, and SCSS. I excel in designing and maintaining responsive websites that offer a smooth user experience. My expertise lies in crafting dynamic, engaging interfaces through writing clean and optimized code and utilizing cutting-edge development tools and techniques. I am also a team player who thrives in collaborating with cross-functional teams to produce outstanding web applications.

experience.title: EXPERIENCE
experience.subtitle: Each project is a unique piece of development üß©

element0.title: Education at the Institute
element0.subtitle: IKIT (SFU), Applied Informatics
element0.description: Acquired fundamental knowledge in frontend development during my time at the institute. Studied modern technologies and tools for building interfaces, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Gained experience in developing user interfaces and worked with various libraries and frameworks.

element1.title: KozhinDev
element1.subtitle: Steroids
element1.description: Steroids is an open-source framework that provides a React and Redux-based ecosystem with a wide range of ready-to-use components, a unique architecture, UI Kit and SSR capabilities. This was my first commercial project in which I actively contributed. My main responsibilities included writing tests using Jest, developing components using SCSS (BEM) and writing code in React.

element2.title: SibDev
element2.subtitle: NDA projects
element2.description: I have had the opportunity to work on various projects where I was involved in the full implementation of the frontend part of websites of varying complexity. The libraries I used during implementation included Redux, TanStackQuery, React Hook Form, Ant Design, React Router, TypeScript and Axios.

element3.title: SFU
element3.subtitle: Prisma
element3.description: Prisma is a comprehensive hybrid adaptive management system for educational programs that can be used by leaders at any level to make managerial decisions. In this project, I was one of the lead developers. The libraries used in the development included Nivo/Antd (charts), SCSS (BEM), Ant Design, TanStackQuery, TypeScript, Axios, React Router and Vite.
